comments.body: I think this recipe can be `noarch`, https://conda-forge.readthedocs.io/en/latest/meta.html#building-noarch-packages. Thus, please remove the `skip` line and add `noarch: python` instead.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +13,17 @@  noarch: python
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
